MainSection.P: This website is a personal project created with the goal of showcasing the use of Next.js and Tailwind CSS, which are two of the most used frameworks in recent Web Development.

Features.P: Below are some details about the frameworks used in this project.
Features.nextDescription: Next.js is a framework that makes it easy to create Web Apps, with features like SSR and SSG, improving the website's performance.
Features.TailwindDescription: Tailwind is a CSS framework used to style HTML elements, containing a lot of utility classes to enhance the site's design.
Features.reactDescription: React is a JavaScript library used to create UI components, that can be reused in different parts of the app.

BlogSection.description: Follow the official framework blogs to stay updated on the latest news

tailwind.text: In the official Tailwind blog, you can find the tailwind's latest releases, as well as tips on how to use it.

next.text: The Next.js blog is the place for you to stay updated on the framework's news and futures updates.

Examples.title: Example of Fetching Server Side Data in Next JS
